standard.ts: The cleaning of the source is complete.
eWebEditPro cannot clean the document until these errors are fixed:
There was an error in the dialog. The client installation for the editor may need to be run to correct the issue.
Do you want to clean the source code now?
This may take several seconds to a minute or more depending on the size of your document.
Copying and pasting can result in source code that is unnecessary or incompatible.
Source code generated by Office 2000 has been detected.
There is excessive source code that may prevent you from changing text format.
You may clean the source code later by right-clicking and selecting 'Clean Source Code'.
Search again from beginning of document?
The page content is still initializing. Please wait...
A license is required for host:
Internet Explorer 4.0 or later is required.

The editor was not able to create the DHTML Editor.
Please run the client installation or contact your system administrator.

The editor was not able to create the Source View Editor.
Please run the client installation or contact your system administrator.

The editor was not able to create the Toolbar.
Please run the client installation or contact your system administrator.
A copy of the picture file must exist on the web site to display correctly on your web page.
File is not a picture file.
No access to server file system.
&User Name with FTP Host, example, user@ftp.remotehost

Sorry, the connection could not be established.
Please verify that the login and connection information are correct.

Error uploading the selected file. The uploading of files may not be allowed at this location.
Please verify that the connection settings and server permissions are correct.
Could not find the picture file.
Obtaining the list of available images
Please check the location and try again.
Timed out attempting to locate picture file.
The selected file is too large to allow an upload. Either reduce the size of the file or see your administrator to increase the size of files allowed for upload to the server. The maximum size is
Finished checking the selection. Do you want to check the rest of the document?
Do you want to check the rest of the document?
Microsoft Word 97 or later is required.
Unable to create special dictionary for this eWebEditPro installation.
Are you sure you want to delete this toolbar?

Resetting the toolbars will reinitialize all features to their default values. Any customized values may be lost.
Do you want to continue?

WARNING: This content contains tags that Microsoft Word may not recognize. Microsoft Word may corrupt the content, introduce invalid tags, or may not display it at all.
Do you want to continue?
The Upload Module could not be created. Aborting file operation. Please re-install.
There are no files available for uploading to the server.
Aborting file selection. Could not display the file:
You are about to upload your selected content items to the server. Do you want to upload now?
The upload failed for an unknown reason. The server was not able to process the upload request.
You are about to edit your document in MS Word. Due to the limitations of HTML, there may be a loss of formatting when returning the document to the editor.
You are about to replace the current editor content with the content in MS Word. Due to the limitations of HTML, there may be a loss of formatting when returning the document to the editor.
If you don't insert the Word content into the editor, your changes will be discarded.
Are you sure that you want to undo all changes and restore the previous version of the document?
Are you sure that you want to restore the document that replaced this one?
The editor was not able to create the Image Editor. Please run the Image Edit installation to ensure that the feature is installed.
Please save the file using an acceptable filename or file format.
Change color depth of current image
Could not create image gear control!
Could not create image gear art control!
This function is not available for images less than 8 bit color depth.
Please select a filename for the Thumbnail.
Invalid License: The WebImageFX product must have a purchased license to make its functionality available. Please contact your Ektron vendor for purchasing information.
Either the receiving page, or a page that it requires, does not exist on the server.
This item needs to be a number:
Number of Options should be greater than zero (0).
At least one field is not valid. Please correct it and try again.
Could not connect to the server. Upload is not possible.
The specified dimensions have exceed the maximum allowed. Please reduce the values.
Would you like to copy annotations as well? If so, we'll burn the annotations into the image and you won't be able to edit them any longer.
Would you like to cut annotations as well? If so, we'll burn the annotations into the image and you won't be able to edit them any longer.
Would you like to delete annotations in this as well? If so, we'll burn the annotations into the image and you won't be able to edit them any longer.
Close this image editing session without saving
Due to the limitations of the specified file format, your image is saved in true color format.
Fields within the same group must have unique names.

Total a list of numeric values
Average a list of numeric values
Count the number of values in a list
Check item to be selected by default.
The selected file is not a valid file format to allow an upload.

If successful, this window will close automatically.
Sorry, the FTP folder specified cannot be found. Please verify that the FTP transfer information are correct.
Error: Unable to load the Microsoft Calendar Control.
You do not have the Administrator privilege that is required to install this application. This installation may fail but you may choose to continue. Would you like to continue the installation?
First item is not a valid selection. For example, "(Select)"
In order to continue your action, this image must be reduced to a single background layer. Would you like to merge the layers now?
It has been reset to zero(0).

Element cannot be empty according to the Schema.

Cannot set the root tag. We do not have an XML document.

Cannot set the root tag. May be displaying the root tag, or we don't have an XML document, or the root tag is empty.
Invalid namespace for creating XML document template.
Installed XML Parser does not support transformation.
The specified XSLT file does not exist.

Minimum of eight (8) characters with at least one digit

To discard your changes, click OK, otherwise, click Cancel."
Use this element as the root tag
The content is not accessibility compliant.
Would you like to correct it?
Please fill in the accessibility compliance field(s).
Content is invalid. Online validation site:
The WebEQ3 applet is not installed.
Sun Java (JVM) is required. Visit http://java.com/getjava.
Sun Java (JVM) version 1.4 is required. Visit http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/download.html.
Do you wish to wait up to two (2) minutes for the document to complete?
The document is in the process of resolving links. While this is occurring, the document may not be fully available for retrieval.
During this process some portions of the document may not be available. If this operation continues some items may be lost.
WebImageFX is not able to edit this image. A math image can only be edited with the Mathematical Expression editor.

On the Vista operating system local files cannot be displayed in content that is hosted on a server. There are local images or files in the content going into the editor. You must upload the images now or you will not be able to view them from the content you are editing. Do you want to perform the upload now?
Local images will not display in the content you are editing. To view the images please select the Automatic-Upload feature and upload the images to the server.

The Google Toolbar Notifier is known to conflict with this editor. The browser may freeze or simply disappear during the normal use of the editor. The Google Toolbar Notifier has been disabled to avoid this problem. Please restart the browser for the change to take effect.
At least one field has a default value that fails validation.
At least one field has an invalid field name. Names are required, must start with a letter, and not contain spaces, colons or several other characters.
